This document gives an overview of the functionality provided by the R package
`APCtools`.

```{r packages, message = FALSE}
library(APCtools)
```

### Prepare data

```{r data preparation}
data(data_RA)
```

### Ridgeline matrix

```{r ridgeline matrix}
plot_ridgeline(data_RA, y_var = "JS_HUR_Reisedistanz")
plot_ridgelineMatrix(data_RA)
```
